physical_server.username: <enter username for ESXi host here> (sample: root)
physical_server.password: <enter password for ESXi host here> (sample: VMware123!)
physical_server.ip_address: <enter IP Address for ESXi host here> (sample: 10.0.0.10)
physical_server.deploy_vms_to_this_network: <enter the port group where you want to attach Hesiod Nodes> (sample: VM Network)
physical_server.deploy_vms_to_this_datastore: <enter the datastore where you want to deploy the Hesiod Nodes> (sample: datastore1)

hesiod_nodes.vm_name: <enter the name of the photon vm> (sample: hesnode01)
hesiod_nodes.ip_address: <enter the ip address of the photon vm> (sample: 10.0.0.11)
hesiod_nodes.password: <enter the desired password of the photon vm> (sample: VMware123!)
